title: qclay
author: qclay
content: We are improving the Blockchain Ecosystem, introducing a stylish menu and a convenient login page. 💫 Micro interactivity ads an additional highlight - every click and transition. Evolution is real! ✨                  https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSNXKWGhR/                                       🌐 Contact Us at qclay.design📩 Email - info@qclay.design🚀 Telegram: t.me/qclay

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You made your service announcement in the wrong board. You should probably move it to;Services or Service Announcements if you accept payments in BitcoinService Announcements (Altcoins) if you accept payments in altcoins

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: In fact, your service improves the UI/UX Design of the web page or apps and has nothing to do with the Blockchain Ecosystem, or at least it is the target audience.In addition to @Bitcoin_Arena's advice, it is very important to add previous projects and user experiences.The number of reviews for the service is limited. It is true that the UI/UX design of ----> http://qclay.design/ is elegant, but the site is slow and there is useless animation, in addition to the fact that there is an audio clip that plays automatically which is baaad.
